name: Aldo
description:
Aldo started as a learning project for me to teach myself the ins and outs of unity and game development as a whole. The game was built almost a year ago now!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I worked on the game for 3 months, and created all the assets from artwork and animation, to the game design and programming! This project quickly became very passionate for me, and even though it is a pretty short game (40 minutes) I hope you guys can still find some pleasure in playing it!

The game definitely has its flaws, and I want no one to expect a pristine and polished gaming experience! I am now working on a project that will hopefully accomplish both of those things, and then some!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Contact

Thanks for checking out my game and feedback is greatly appreciated! You can reach me at the following social media outlets and email below!
